lyric:
[by:_Ciao]
[00:09.93]Worried sky, in need of something green to sleep at night
[00:19.79]Aiming high, we're living restless but it's you and I
[00:26.11]
[00:28.93]Can see we are, the shade, defining rain
[00:33.60]True work of art, is not, a thing we change
[00:39.61]Aiming high
[00:42.37]We're living restless but it's you and I
[00:45.74]
[00:49.47]Tried to keep our colours
[00:53.54]Inside the lines, insides the lines
[00:59.02]But it's hard to draw emotions
[01:03.44]In troubled minds, inside the lines
[01:38.99]
[01:41.46]Bold and brave, compared to others we just paint them grey
[01:51.28]Here to stay, know that the two of us won't fade away
[02:00.01]
[02:00.36]Can see we are, the shade, defining rain
[02:05.29]True work of art, is not, a thing we change
[02:11.19]Hard to hide
[02:13.95]Illumine like the moon that pulls the tide
[02:20.66]
[02:20.97]Tried to keep our colours
[02:25.09]Inside the lines, insides the lines
[02:30.57]But it's hard to draw emotions
[02:34.93]In troubled minds, inside the lines
[02:39.50]
[03:10.51]
tlyric:
[by:EnderCrafter]
[00:04.99]
[00:07.41]
[00:09.93]惶恐这天空，在夜幕降临时令我无法安眠
[00:19.79]怀踌躇壮志，你我却是如此的焦躁与不安
[00:28.93]你我的斜影随着细雨飘荡
[00:33.60]我们却无力改变时光留下的杰作
[00:39.61]满腔热忱
[00:42.37]你我却如此焦躁不安
[00:49.47]曾试着收敛自己不羁的色彩
[00:53.54]循规蹈矩着去学会平淡
[00:59.02]却难免意气用事的情感
[01:03.44]迷惑中逆来顺受的平凡
[01:41.46]大胆又勇敢，我们偏执意为其抹上一片灰白
[01:51.28]觅一处静好，坐观沧海桑田但你我永不再改
[02:00.36]你我的斜影随着细雨飘荡
[02:05.29]我们却无力改变时光留下的杰作
[02:11.19]无处可逃
[02:13.95]被潮汐拍打在月的寒凉里
[02:20.97]曾试着收敛自己不羁的色彩
[02:25.09]循规蹈矩着去学会平淡
[02:30.57]却难免意气用事的情感
[02:34.93]迷惑中逆来顺受的平凡
